text: Andychristyite is a lead copper tellurate mineral with the chemical formula PbCuTeOHO. Its type locality is the Soda Mountains in California. It was named after Welsh–Australian mineralogist Andrew G. Christy.Andychristyite on mindat.org Electron microscope image of an andychristyite crystal == References == Category:Lead minerals Category:Copper(II) minerals Category:Tellurate and selenate minerals
title: Andychristyite
